channel.title: Rate My Gem Algorithm
channel.description:
What It Does : What gem will you get from the gem rock
Description: Okay, this is a Gem algorithm i made.... It's not a probibility; its what gem you will get, restarts every 200 gems
Took About 20 Minutes To Make It =|
[code] /*Starts Sonis's Gem Algorithm*/ if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("minegems")) { addSkillXP(65,14); if (misc.random(5) == (1) || misc.random(5) == (3) || misc.random(5) == (4)) /*20+20+20 = 60%*/ { if (misc.random(3) == (1)) { addItem(1625, 1); } /*Opal - 20%*/ else if (misc.random(3) == (2)) { addItem(1629, 1); } /*RedTopaz - 20%*/ else if (misc.random(3) == (3)) { addItem(1627, 1); }} /*Jade - 20%*/ else { /*100-60 = 40% Left*/ if (misc.random(8) == (3) || misc.random(8) == (5) || misc.random(8) == (6)) /*40 / 8 = 5%ea.*/ { addItem(1623, 1); } /*Sapphire - 15%*/ else if (misc.random(8) <= (2)) { addItem(1621, 1); } /*Emerald - 10%*/ else if (misc.random(8) >= (7)) { /*10%...5%left*/ if (misc.random(2) == (2)) { if (misc.random(10) == (10)) { addItem(6571, 1); } /*Onyx - 0.5%*/ else if (misc.random(10) == (2) || misc.random(10) == (6)) { addItem(1619, 1); } /*Ruby - 1%*/ else { addItem(1631, 1); }} /*DragonStone - 3.5%*/ else { addItem(1619, 1); }} /*Ruby - 5% - (7% Total)*/ else { addItem(1617, 1); }}}} /*Diamond - 5%*/ [/code]

item.title: Rate My Gem Algorithm
item.dc:creator: @Sonis Sonis
item.description:
@Sonis wrote:

What It Does : What gem will you get from the gem rock

Description:
Okay, this is a Gem algorithm i made…
It’s not a probibility; its what gem you will get, restarts every 200 gems

Took About 20 Minutes To Make It =|

				/*Starts Sonis's Gem Algorithm*/
if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("minegems"))			{	addSkillXP(65,14);
	if (misc.random(5) == (1) || misc.random(5) == (3) || misc.random(5) == (4))					/*20+20+20 = 60%*/
								{
		if (misc.random(3) == (1))			{	addItem(1625, 1);	}		/*Opal - 20%*/
		else if (misc.random(3) == (2))			{	addItem(1629, 1);	}		/*RedTopaz - 20%*/
		else if (misc.random(3) == (3))			{	addItem(1627, 1);	}}		/*Jade - 20%*/
	else 							{					/*100-60 = 40% Left*/
	if (misc.random(8) == (3) || misc.random(8) == (5) || misc.random(8) == (6))					/*40 / 8 = 5%ea.*/
								{	addItem(1623, 1);	}		/*Sapphire - 15%*/
		else if (misc.random(8) <= (2))			{	addItem(1621, 1);	}		/*Emerald - 10%*/
		else if (misc.random(8) >= (7))			{					/*10%...5%left*/
			if (misc.random(2) == (2))		{
				if (misc.random(10) == (10))	{	addItem(6571, 1);	}		/*Onyx - 0.5%*/
				else if (misc.random(10) == (2) || misc.random(10) == (6))
								{	addItem(1619, 1);	} 		/*Ruby - 1%*/
				else				{	addItem(1631, 1);	}}		/*DragonStone - 3.5%*/
			else					{	addItem(1619, 1);	}}		/*Ruby - 5% - (7% Total)*/
		else						{	addItem(1617, 1);	}}}}		/*Diamond - 5%*/

Read full topic
